    • Constructor Detail

      • ChequeAccount

        public ChequeAccount(java.lang.String name)
        Create a new ChequeAccount object.
        Default credit limit is 0.0
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • deposit

        public boolean deposit(double amount)
        Make a deposit into a ChequeAccount
        Specified by:
        deposit in class BaseAccount
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to deposit
        Returns:
        True if the amount to deposit is positive AND the amount + the current balance + the credit limit is greater or equal to the transaction charge (prevents overdraw).
        False if the amount to deposit is negative OR the amount + the current balance + the credit limit is less than the transaction charge (prevents overdraw).

      • withdraw

        public boolean withdraw(double amount)
        Make a withdrawal from a ChequeAccount
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to withdraw
        Returns:
        True if the amount is positive AND the amount + the transaction charge is less than or equal to the balance + the credit limit (prevents overdraw).
        False if the amount is negative OR the amount + the transaction charge is greater than the balance + the credit limit (prevents overdraw).

      • setCreditLimit

        public boolean setCreditLimit(double newLimit)
        Setter method for the account's credit limit
        Parameters:
        newLimit - The new credit limit to be set
        Returns:
        True if the new limit is positive
        False if the new limit is negative
